00026 /*
00027  * This function finds the the amount of white ie area in a monochrome image.
00028  * This works with 8 bit images by assuming everything above 1 is white.
00029  */
00030 DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV
00031 FreeImageAlgorithms_MonoImageFindWhiteFraction(FIBITMAP *src, double *white_area, double *black_area);
00032 
00033 // This function determines how a detail is present though two images.
00034 // tp (True Positive) A detail present in src is also in result.
00035 // tn (True Negative) A detail not in src is not in result ie two pixels that are 0.
00036 // fp (False Positive) A detail not in src is in result.
00037 // fn (False Negative) A detail in src is not in result.
00038 DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV
00039 FreeImageAlgorithms_MonoTrueFalsePositiveComparison(FIBITMAP *src, FIBITMAP *result,
00040                                                                                                         int *tp, int *tn, int *fp, int *fn);
